displayName.english: Well, look what you found there

description.english: Picked up your first Collectible.
description.french: Récupérer le premier objet à collectionner.
description.italian: Raccogli il primo oggetto.
description.spanish: Encuentra el primer objeto coleccionable.
description.japanese: 最初のガラクタをゲットする

displayName.english: Ah, finally some peace and quiet
displayName.japanese: 老後は骨董屋でも開くか

description.english: Collected all Collectibles.
description.french: Récupérer tous les objets à collectionner.
description.italian: Raccogli tutti gli oggetti.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los objetos coleccionables.
description.japanese: 全てのガラクタをゲットする

description.english: Achieved Goal Times on all maps.
description.german: Erreiche auf allen Karten die Zielzeit.
description.french: Atteindre l'objectif temps de tous les niveaux.
description.italian: Completa tutti i livelli nel minor tempo possibile.
description.spanish: Consigue terminar todos los mapas antes del tiempo reto.
description.japanese: 全てのステージで目標タイムを達成する

description.english: Achieved Shifts Goal on all maps.
description.german: Erreiche auf allen Karten die Wechsel-Ziele.
description.french: Atteindre l'objectif de changements dimensionnels de tous les niveaux.
description.italian: Completa tutti i livelli cambiando dimensione il meno possibile.
description.spanish: Consigue terminar todos los mapas con menos cambios que los requeridos en los cambios reto.
description.japanese: 全てのステージで目標シフト回数を達成する

displayName.japanese: もの好きじゃなあ・・

description.english: Used the 'Do A Thing!' menu item.
description.french: Utiliser l'option « Faire un truc ! ».
description.italian: Seleziona "Fai qualcosa" nel menu.
description.spanish: Utiliza la opción del menú "¡Haz algo!".
description.japanese: メニュー画面で“おまけ”を選択する

description.english: Picked up the IDS device.
description.french: Récupérer le système IDS.
description.italian: Raccogli il dispositivo IDS.
description.spanish: Recoge el dispositivo IDS.
description.japanese: IDSを“手に入れる”

description.english: Powered up the first generator.
description.french: Alimenter le premier générateur.
description.italian: Riattiva il primo generatore.
description.spanish: Enciende el primer generador.
description.japanese: 最初のジェネレーターを起動する

description.english: Powered up the second generator.
description.french: Alimenter le second générateur.
description.italian: Riattiva il secondo generatore.
description.spanish: Enciende el segundo generador.
description.japanese: 2つ目のジェネレーターを起動する

description.english: Powered up the third generator.
description.french: Alimenter le troisième générateur.
description.italian: Riattiva il terzo generatore.
description.spanish: Enciende el tercer generador.
description.japanese: 3つ目のジェネレーターを起動する

description.english: Powered up the Uber-IDS.
description.french: Alimenter le système SuperIDS.
description.italian: Riattiva l'UberIDS.
description.spanish: Enciende el Súper IDS.
description.japanese: メガIDSを起動する

description.english: Knocked Ike over with an object.
description.german: Wirf Ike mit einem Gegenstand um.
description.french: Lancer un objet sur Ike.
description.italian: Colpisci Ike con un oggetto.
description.spanish: Golpea a Ike con un objeto.
description.japanese: アイクに物をぶつけて転ばせる

description.english: Broke 20 panes of glass.
description.french: Casser 20 panneaux de verre.
description.italian: Rompi 20 lastre di vetro.
description.spanish: Rompe 20 cristales.
description.japanese: ガラスを20枚割る

description.english: Viewed your portrait in all dimensions.
description.german: Schau dir dein Portrait in allen Dimensionen an.
description.french: Voir votre portrait dans toutes les dimensions.
description.italian: Guarda il tuo ritratto in tutte le dimensioni.
description.spanish: Mira tu retrato en todas las dimensiones.
description.japanese: 自分の肖像画を、すべての次元で見る

description.english: Made it through every level at least once without dying.
description.german: Beende jedes Level mindestens einmal, ohne dabei zu sterben.
description.french: Terminez tous les niveaux au moins une fois sans mourir.
description.italian: Supera tutti i livelli una volta senza morire.
description.spanish: Completa cada nivel sin morir.
description.japanese: 全てのステージを、少なくとも一度は死なずにクリアする

description.english: Solved 'Choose Wisely' by choosing each battery first.
description.german: Löse „Wähle weise“, indem du jede Batterie zuerst wählst.
description.french: Terminez « Le choix est fait ! » en commençant par chacune des batteries.
description.italian: Risolvi "Scegli con saggezza" scegliendo subito le batterie.
description.spanish: Resuelve "Elige sabiamente" eligiendo todas las baterías al principio.
description.japanese: “賢い選択を” で、最初に選ぶバッテリー4通りを全て試し、クリアする

displayName.japanese: 見上げた鳥類学者じゃな

description.english: Complete all levels in "The Desmond Debacle".
description.french: Terminer tous les niveaux de « La débâcle de Desmond ».
description.italian: Completa tutti i livelli in "La disfatta di Desmond".
description.spanish: Completa todos los niveles de "La debacle de Desmond".
description.japanese: “デズモンドのユーウツ” の全ステージをクリアする。

description.english: Collect all collectibles in "The Desmond Debacle".
description.french: Obtenir tous les objets à collectionner dans « La débâcle de Desmond ».
description.italian: Raccogli tutti gli oggetti collezionabili in "La disfatta di Desmond".
description.spanish: Consigue todos los objetos coleccionables en "La debacle de Desmond".
description.japanese: “デズモンドのユーウツ” の全てのガラクタをゲットする。

description.english: Achieve Shift Goal on all levels in "The Desmond Debacle".
description.german: Erreiche in allen Leveln aus „Das Desmond-Debakel“ die ideale Anzahl an Wechseln.
description.french: Atteindre les objectifs de changements dimensionnels de tous les niveaux de « La débâcle de Desmond ».
description.italian: Vinci la "Sfida dimensionale" in tutti i livelli in "La disfatta di Desmond".
description.spanish: Consigue los cambios reto de todos los niveles de "La debacle de Desmond".
description.japanese: “デズモンドのユーウツ” の全ステージで、目標シフト数を達成する。

displayName.japanese: 早いなんてレベルじゃねーぞ

description.english: Achieve Goal Time on all levels in "The Desmond Debacle".
description.german: Erreiche in allen Leveln aus „Das Desmond-Debakel“ die Zielzeit.
description.french: Atteindre les objectifs temps de tous les niveaux de « La débâcle de Desmond ».
description.italian: Vinci la "sfida contro il tempo" in tutti i livelli in "la disfatta di Desmond.
description.spanish: Consigue el tiempo reto de todos los niveles de "La debacle de Desmond".
description.japanese: “デズモンドのユーウツ” の全ステージで、目標タイムを達成する。

description.english: Make it through every level in "The Desmond Debacle" at least once without dying.
description.german: Beende alle Level in „Das Desmond-Debakel“, ohne zu sterben.
description.french: Terminer tous les niveaux de « La débâcle de Desmond » au moins une fois sans mourir.
description.italian: Completa una volta tutti i livelli in "La disfatta di Desmond" senza morire.
description.spanish: Completa todos los niveles de "La debacle de Desmond" sin morir ni una vez.
description.japanese: “デズモンドのユーウツ” の全ステージを、少なくとも一度は死なずにクリアする。

displayName.japanese: なんというストイックさ・・
